      • saveResolutionPolicy

        public void saveResolutionPolicy(java.lang.String value)
        Stores the policy for resolution settings. The policy defines when the resolution will be applied, what values will be used, etc.
        Parameters:
        value - the policy for resolution settings

      • getResolutionPolicy

        public int getResolutionPolicy()

        Returns:
        the policy for resolution settings

      • getDimension

        public java.lang.String getDimension(java.lang.String dimension,
                            java.lang.String table)
        Returns the user defined value of the width or height depending the orientation of the device. If there is no record it returns the default values.
        Parameters:
        dimension - width/height of the current orientation
        table - the database table from which retrieves the values.
        Returns:
